1.name: Flame Barrier
1.desc: Gain Fire Aura when you attune to fire.

2.name: Sunspot
2.desc: Inflict damage at your location when you attune to fire.

3.name: Burning Rage
3.desc: Deal more damage to burning foes.

1.name: Burning Precision
1.desc: Critical hits have a chance to cause burning and burning lasts longer.

2.name: Conjurer
2.desc: Gain a Fire Aura when an ally picks up a conjurer weapon or you use a signet; Conjure weapons have more charges.

3.name: Power Overwhelming
3.desc: Gain condition damage based on your power.

1.name: Pyromancer's Training
1.desc: Deal more damage while attuned to fire. Reduces recharge on all fire weapon skills.

2.name: One with Fire
2.desc: Fire Aura's you apply last longer and grant might when applied.

3.name: Burning Fire
3.desc: Use Cleansing Fire automatically when you have a number of conditions on you. Cantrips grant you might when used.

1.name: Blinding Ashes
1.desc: Blind foes that you burn.

2.name: Persisting Flames
2.desc: Blast finishers you execute on fire fields grant fury. Fire fields last longer. Create a Lava Font when you go down.

3.name: Pyromancer's Puissance
3.desc: Each skill you use while attuned to fire grants you might.

1.name: Zephyr's Speed
1.desc: Move faster while attuned to air.

2.name: Lightning Strike
2.desc: Strike your foe with lightning.

3.name: Weak Spot
3.desc: Chance to cause vulnerability on critical hits.

1.name: Zephyr's Boon
1.desc: Auras Grant fury and swiftness when applied.

2.name: One with Air
2.desc: Gain superspeed when attuning to air.

3.name: Ferocious Winds
3.desc: Gain ferocity based on your healing.

1.name: Inscription
1.desc: Grants a boon associated with your current attunement when you cast a glyph. Reduce Glyph Recharge.

2.name: Aeromancer's Training
2.desc: Gain Ferocity while attuned to Air. Reduces recharge on all air weapon skills.

3.name: Tempest Defense
3.desc: Surround yourself with a shocking Aura when disabled (stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear or launch). Deal more damage to stunned or knocked-down foes.

1.name: Bolt to the Heart
1.desc: Deal more damage when your foe's health drops below the threshold.

2.name: Fresh Air
2.desc: Recharge air attunement on critical hit.

3.name: Lightning Rod
3.desc: Disabling an enemy (stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear or launch) causes them to be struck by a lightning bolt.

1.name: Soothing Mist
1.desc: You and nearby allies regenerate health while you are attuned to water.

2.name: Healing Ripple
2.desc: Heal nearby allies when attuning to water.

3.name: Aquatic Benevolence
3.desc: Healing done to allies is increased. (25%)

1.name: Soothing Ice
1.desc: Gain regeneration and Frost Aura when you are struck by a critical hit.

2.name: Piercing Shards
2.desc: While attuned to water, your spells deal more damage to vulnerable foes. Vulnerability lasts longer.

3.name: Stop, Drop, and Roll
3.desc: Dodge rolling removes burning and chilled.

1.name: Soothing Disruption
1.desc: Cantrips grant you regeneration and vigor. Cantrip recharge is reduced.

2.name: Cleansing Wave
2.desc: Remove a condition from you and your allies when attuning to water.

3.name: Aquamancerâ€™s Training
3.desc: Deal extra damage when your health is above the threshold. Reduces recharge on all water weapon skills.

1.name: Cleansing Water
1.desc: Remove a condition when granting regeneration to yourself or an ally.

2.name: Powerful Aura
2.desc: Auras you gain from weapon skills are also applied to nearby allies.

3.name: Bountiful Power
3.desc: Deal more damage for each boon on you.

1.name: Stone Flesh
1.desc: Gain toughness while attuned to earth.

2.name: Earthen Blast
2.desc: Damage foes and cripple them for 3 seconds when attuning to earth.

3.name: Geomancer's Defense
3.desc: You take less damage from foes within close range.

1.name: Armor of Earth
1.desc: Gain Armor of Earth when your health drops below the threshold.

2.name: Serrated Stones
2.desc: Bleeds you apply last longer; deal more damage to bleeding foes.

3.name: Elemental Shielding
3.desc: Cast protection when applying an aura to yourself or an ally.

1.name: Strength of Stone
1.desc: Gain condition damage based on your toughness.

2.name: Rock Solid
2.desc: Grant stability to nearby allies when attuning to earth.

3.name: Geomancer's Training
3.desc: You recover from crippled, immobilized, and chilled faster. Reduces recharge on all earth weapon skills.

1.name: Diamond Skin
1.desc: Conditions cannot be applied to you when your health is above the threshold.

2.name: Written in Stone
2.desc: Maintain the passive effects of signets when you activate them. Reduces recharge of signets.

3.name: Stone Heart
3.desc: You cannot be critically hit while attuned to earth.

1.name: Arcane Fury
1.desc: Gain fury for 2s when you switch attunements.

2.name: Lingering Elements
2.desc: Attunement bonuses linger for 5s after leaving that attunement.

3.name: Arcane Precision
3.desc: Skills have a change to apply a condition on critical hits. Attunements recharge faster.

1.name: Arcane Energy
1.desc: Arcane skills restore 25 endurance when used and have 20% lower recharges.

2.name: Renewing Stamina
2.desc: Gain vigor for 5s when you deliver a critical hit.

3.name: Arcane Abatement
3.desc: Take less damage from falling. Create a spell when you take falling damage, based on your attunement.

1.name: Arcane Resurrection
1.desc: You have increased revive speed. When you revive an ally, you and the revived ally gain an aura based on your attunement.

2.name: Elemental Contingency
2.desc: Gain a boon when you are struck, based on your current attunement.

3.name: Final Shielding
3.desc: Create an Arcane Shield for 5s when your health drops below the threshold (25s).

1.name: Evasive Arcane
1.desc: Create an attunement-based spell at end of your dodge.

2.name: Elemental Surge
2.desc: Based on your current attunement, arcane skills cause a condition to foes that they hit. Gain 150 more ferocity for 15s when you use an arcane skill.

3.name: Elemental Attunement
3.desc: When attuning to an element, you and nearby allies gain a boon.
